entry.title: Pigs, ferrets and cats looking for forever homes in Dorset - Bournemouth Echo
entry.summary: Dorset-based animal rescue centre Margaret Green is hoping to find loving homes for two pigs, two ferrets and a cat this week. Pudding and Pie are two adorable rescue pigs looking for a home together. They are very friendly and active pigs who ended up in the care of Margaret Green when their previous owner…

Bradley Walsh walks off The Chase in hysterics after Shaun Wallace’s answer blunder - Daily Express
entry.summary: The possible answers were a mole, a ferret or a badger. Bradley mocked Ryan's reasonings for ferret: "Can you imagine a mole taking the cables through?" "It’s not that, it’s seeing him come through the hole like ‘Where do you want this lads? Anyone got my gloves? Right Baz, put that down… ma’am’.

entry.title: An Adorable Black-Footed Ferret Kit Was Born at a Smithsonian Institute - Washingtonian
entry.summary: A black-footed ferret kit was born around 3 PM yesterday at the Smithsonian’s Conservation Biology Institute in Front Royal, Virginia. Animal care staff are monitoring mom, Potpie, for additional kits born in the litter.This is the third litter for Potpie, and the third litter for dad Daly.

entry.title: Black-Footed Ferrets Are Born at the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute - Smithsonian's National Zoo and Conservation Biology Institute
entry.summary: Video Carnivore keepers at the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute (SCBI) in Front Royal, Virginia, are welcoming a litter of endangered black-footed ferret kits. Three-year-old female Potpie has birthed one kit already, which was born at 3:41 p.m. and can be viewed via the Black-Footed Ferret Cam. Animal care staff are closely monitoring the soundless, black-and-white…

entry.title: Bounty Hunter Contracts for Taxable Property: Illegal Contracts for Legal Services Do Not Defeat Jurisdiction - JD Supra
entry.summary: A “tax ferret contract” is an agreement to locate property that has been under appraised or omitted from the tax rolls altogether. Tax ferrets are by no means Good Samaritans seeking to safeguard the tax base. On the contrary, they are private profiteers seeking to line their own pockets at the expense of the property…

entry.title: Black Footed Ferret - KUNM
entry.summary: Sat. 5/22 9a: This week we explore a creature that used to live throughout the mountain west United States, the elusive black footed ferret. Once declared extinct, the highly endangered specialist predator may make a comeback in the North American prairie thanks in part to our guest, Paul Marinari, Senior Curator at the Smithsonian Conservation Biology Institute at the…

entry.title: Meet Boba, no one wanted her due to a hip deformity making her...
entry.summary: Meet Boba, no one wanted her due to a hip deformity making her nickname wigglebutt. She just recovered from a bad ear infection.

entry.title: Friendly ferret found - Observer-Reporter
entry.summary: Codey Haddad was surprised by a friendly visitor outside his Second Street house in Washington Saturday. A ferret had been roaming the neighborhood about 11 a.m. near the Seventh Ward playground. Haddad was able to catch it and put it in a cat carrier.

entry.title: Infographic: How to Ferret Out SARS-CoV-2 in Sewage - The Scientist
entry.summary: Raw sewage collected from the outflow of buildings, or the influent flow of sewage treatment works, is dispensed into multiwell plates containing Nanotrap® magnetic virus particles (Ceres Nano) and loaded into the KingFisher Flex liquid handling robot (Thermo Scientific), wherein viral RNA is concentrated and extracted. Aliquots of the RNA are then mixed with PCR…
